Subject: Request for Assistance with Running a Scan for IS Local Administrators Group
Description:
Hi Stealthbits Support Team,

We would like to run a scan across all our hosts to identify if the group IS Local Administrators is a member of the local administrators group. Could you please assist us in setting up and executing this scan?


Thank you, 
Mawloda
What_We_Know__c: Customer is looking to find all machines where the " IS Local Administrators" group is a member of the Local Admins group. They are currently licensed for the Windows Solution which has a job for this.
Next_Steps__c: Directed the customer to use the Windows > Privileged Accounts > SG_LocalAdmins job which should have the information they are looking for
Solution_Comment__c:
+++++
Question/Answer
+++++
2025_0108 EMAIL to the customer
+++++
1) It looks like you are licensed for the Netwrix Enterprise Auditor Windows Solution which should contain a job that can help you identify where IS Local Administrators in a member of the local admins group.

2) In the NEA Console, expand the following: Windows > Privileged Accounts > SG_LocalAdmins

Image_2025-01-08_13-56-56.png

3) By default, this targets the ALL WINDOWS SERVERS (NO DC) Host List

Image_2025-01-08_13-56-02.png

4) Run the job and the information you're looking for should be found under the Results node beneath the job.

Image_2025-01-08_13-58-30.png
+++++
